name: Arrows of Salvation
description:
You are a young fighter who is supposed to start has a guard at the castle today but fate has other plan. 

There about 45m-1h of game play. 

This is the first project I ever done with RPG makerMV. It was mostly done has a proof of concept. It's currently use mostly default RPGmaker MV asset and setting.

WIP: 

  • better control for the Android version (current is a bit unintuitive)
  • Adding animation and emoji when character interact
  • Turn all the ghost town to vibrant cities full of NPC
  • Goblin side quest
  • Correct spelling mistake (sorry)
  • French translation
  • Linux version (maybe?)

 

Plugin & asset use: 

Mobile controls by Pheonix KageDesu (Basic version) https://kdworkshop.net/plugins/mobile-controls/
